headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Open Market
content: A range of vehicles previously limited to returning players is now on the open market. The Marshall Monster truck, Dodo seaplane and Kraken submersible are available to any aspiring kingpin with enough cash to scratch the itch. Plus, brand new to GTA Online, the one and only Duke Oâ€™Death is now in stores and giving retro survivalists post-apocalyptic wet dreams up and down San Andreas.
